definitions: the production of less of a commodity or substance than is wanted or needed

examples.text: underinvestment will lead to a period of underproduction
a treatment for the underproduction of testosterone

shortDefinitions: production of more of commodity or substance than is wanted or needed

definitions: the recording or arrangement of a song or film in such a basic way that it appears rough or unfinished

examples.text: the irreverence, hyperactivity, and underproduction of punk

shortDefinitions: recording or arrangement of song or film in such basic way that it appears rough or unfinished
